Description:
At the edge of the falls you see an old gnome admiring the view and sighing. You realize that he is Timothy's master, you pass him the message and he says:

"I am a skilled craftsman both making potions, gems or gadgets, but that apprentice of mine is completely useless... I left him there near the wolves in the hope that he would give up... or get eaten... well, I guess it's time to go back to the workshop.

Mmm... maybe one of you is worthy and can be my apprentice, I can teach you how to craft something useful."
